item.title: Where Is Hugo
item.description: It’s Alive Hugo + Markdown If you’ve spend much time in the programming space, Markdown. It’s a great lightweight approach to structuring a document. You can choose your own adventure when it comes to level of structure, and that lends itself nicely to the world of blogging. Because it’s essentially a template DSL, it’s relatively easy to go from MD –> HTML. But I’m getting way ahead of myself, so let me back up.
